long_description: The Armpocket i-25 Armband securely carries your phone and running essentials while on the move. Ergonomic design and memory foam padding resists slipping for a secure fit. Small storage pocket fits your keys, gel packs, credit and ID cards. High-visibility reflective piping. Medium fits arms 10 to 16 in. The Armpocket i-25 Armband fits the iPhone 5(R), Samsung Galaxy S III and other phones up to 5.3 in. long.
short_description: The Armpocket i-25 Armband securely carries your phone and running essentials while on the move.
